Text:
Was just about to say thanks for a great collection -then I discovered "NeXium". ;-)
Cannot forget all the superb videos you've posted... you're the best!
Especially "Missing Heart" I look forward to... LOVE the music from them!!
THANX A LOT.

neXium wrote:
